title: eRelevance Corporation Replaces Leading Marketing Automation Solution
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/1/2015 @ 10:43 AM Companies mentioned in this article: eRelevance Corporation 
AUSTIN, Texas, Oct. 1, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- eRelevance Corporation ( www.erelevancecorp.com ), announced today that it replaced a leading marketing automation platform with its own service for marketing its solution to the SMB market. 
"By using the same technology platform that supports the more than 200 accounts we've closed in the last year, we are proving that our technology can be applied to multiple industries," stated Bob Fabbio, co-founder and CEO of eRelevance Corporation. "Our technology-enabled service now supports healthcare, real estate, and technology companies, with additional industries to come." 
eRelevance focuses on small to medium-sized businesses that struggle with the cost and complexity of using software tools to do their own lead generation. The eRelevance service allows them to outsource their internal marketing so that they can focus on their core business. Our service is affordable, starting at just $20 a day! 
The eRelevance service uniquely leverages its advanced technology and marketing expertise/best practices to market to an organization's internal contact database. While most organizations primarily use email to market for this purpose, eRelevance leverages multiple communication channels including email, text, web, social, and automated conversations to generate leads at 2-3 times the effectiveness of traditional marketing efforts. 
About eRelevance Corporation 
eRelevance offers a technology-enabled lead generation service that is focused on delighting our customers. We are located in Austin, Texas and cater to SMBs to reduce their marketing workload and significantly improve their lead generation effectiveness.
